name: sandwich.limo
body:
# What is sandwich.limo
sandwich.limo is [my](http://anand.io) (delicious) PaaS playground. I'm very fascinated with containerization, virtualization, twelve-factor, etc... and I experiment with various technologies here. You can see what I'm currently playing with below.

## Project Hoagie

### Infrastructure
This setup is based on HPE Helion Stackato. The platform is hosted on AWS in a VPC. Total cost is ~$550/mo.

#### VPC (10.0.0.0/16)
##### Subnets
Name | Range | Availability Zone
---- | ---- | ----
Mayonnaise | 10.0.1.0/24 | us-east-1b
Mustard | 10.0.2.0/24 | us-east-1c

##### Instances
Instance | Roles | Type | Subnet
------------ | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
sourdough | load balancer | elb | n/a
bacon | primary, controller, router, filesystem | t2.medium | mayonnaise
salami | mysql, postgresql, mongodb | m3.medium | mayonnaise
turkey | dea | m4.large | mayonnaise
chicken | dea | m4.large | mayonnaise
lettuce | controller, router, harbor | t2.medium | mustard
tomato | rabbit, redis, memcached | m3.medium | mustard
olive | dea | m4.large | mustard
anchovy | dea | m4.large | mustard
